Reviews.Title: “Just Managed”
Reviews.Author: Suresh75
Reviews.Content: month minute decision bed ok slept staying 6 th floor night reception crowded people visiting bars etc morning fight leaking broken toilet cumbersome shower etc breakfast relief simple ok price pay morning pack leave hotel parks vehicle public parking hotel choice tight budget

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly pleasant”
Reviews.Author: A B
Reviews.Content: stayed 20th 23rd feb 2012 try review unbiased helpful goes walked rush inn expecting terrible hotel based reviews read website low expectations greeted pleasantly staff read people passport kept reception period time mine scanned returned immediately start 6th floor main reason stay pleasant neat tidy clean sheets pillows bathroom basics fairly clean yes mould edges shower base shower head fine 15min bath hot water balcony probably home clean isnt 5 star resort plan spend day enjoying people youre probably spend night sleep quality 6th floor night clubs floor night 6th floor strain ears hear faint thud bass honestly floor restaurant breakfast standard consisted half indian food half continental enjoyed location probably aspect hotel 50m metro opposite hotel main road shops dining electronics main road metro station follow road fast food outlets hotel 30min train change lines dubai mall burj khalifa exactly call centrally located booked tour noticed arabian adventures doesnt pick location suggests commonly associated hotels reception tour booking desk helpful wifi costs 1hr 24hrs conclusion recommend hotel 5th floor floor below sleepless night remember 3 star hotel 3 star hotels western countries slightly fussy customer

Reviews.Title: “Good Value Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sahira M
Reviews.Content: cheap cheerful hotel staff freindly nice ur family orientated dont visit indian clubs im western background shocked ok plain carpets bit updating ok price aprox 2 min walk metro amazing looking

Reviews.Title: “Best Location & Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: Mohanakrishnan
Reviews.Content: cleanliness ok improve complementary breakfast varieties menu days stayed 2 weeks realise upper floor night clubs ist floor noice throught night till morning disturbs sleep

Reviews.Title: “Entomologist Heaven”
Reviews.Author: traveller_dxb_10
Reviews.Content: keen trouble finding cockroach days bathroom fans running otherwise run backwards suck pigeon feathers worse vermin infested ventilation shafts enjoy refreshing glass brown tap water keeping bottled water highly recommended ac systems issue fungal bronchitis real possibility internet access available reception cafe
